lines.text: / Ya gotta be hot to play real cool!
I'll show those pigs that I'm not stuck. If I can't blow it down, I'll blow it up.
We've heard the most, but you're the least.
Well, the Big Bad Wolf was really gone / And with him went his corny horn / Went out of this world without a trace / Didn't go to Heaven, was the other place.

[singing]
Well, the piano-playing pig was swinging like a gate / Doing Liberace on the eighty-eights.

[imitating Liberace]
I wish my brother, George, was here!
Sturdy place, this house of bricks / Built in 1776 / High class place with a high class crowd / Sign on the door 'No Wolves Allowed"
